JOB RESPONSIBILITIES: Software Development and Software Implementation.Architect & Design scalable solutions.Guide and ensure that the designs are aligned to the overall architecture.3+ years of experience in team management is must.Excellent capability of writing complex programming.Experience to write a complex query is required.Deep functional knowledge and hands-on experience with Web Services (REST, SOAP etc.) is mandatory.Experience on Payment Gateway integration is plus.Review, test and debug team members' code.Work closely with the DevOps resources to enhance CI/CD process.Maintain schedule of product releases with team members and other teams.Easily recognizes system deficiencies and implement effective solutions.Understands complex database concepts and effectively employs different database design techniques.Professional experience on HTML/HTML5, CSS/CSS3, Sass, Bootstrap, JavaScript and JQuery.Should have sound knowledge in the following area(s): Web 2.0 concept including AJAX & JSON etc.Self-motivated and open to accept ideas from team members.Strong Knowledge about API Integration System.Knowledge in Agile-SCRUM is necessary.Clear understanding in OOP and OOAD.Implement SDLC and coordinate with other members of the team.Good understanding on GIT.Good knowledge in SOA / Microservices will be an advantage.Should be prepared to work under pressure.Committed to meet deadline strictly.Dynamic, self-driven, proactive, energetic and target oriented to achieve the goal.
EDUCATIONAL REQUIREMENTS: B.Sc / M.Sc in Computer Science or equivalent from any reputed University.
ADDITIONAL REQUIREMENTS: The applicants should have experience in the following area(s): Technical Lead (Software)The applicants should have experience in the following business area(s): Software CompanyLanguages: JAVA (Full stack) and Database Knowledge: PostgreSQL.Age at most 40 years.Both males and females are allowed to apply.Knowledge in Jenkins - CI/CT/CD, Kubernetes, Docker Registry, ELK Stack, Nginx, Microservices Architecture, Java Spring-Boot, Message Queue (RabbitMQ), Angular 6 (Type Script) and Jasper Reporting Tools.Candidate having experience in large-scale software development project will get additional point.
COMPENSATION & AND OTHER BENEFITS: As per company policy. Career development & growth opportunities through extensive on-job training and professional training. Employment benefits include festival bonuses, insurance coverage etc. Yearly increment based on performance.
